name: Cannibal Chicken
description:
Disclaimer: This game will have plenty of bugs and is lacking any type of polish.

Cannibal Chicken was made in 7 days for Weekly Game Jam #24. The theme was "Friends for Dinner" - in this case, the other chickens were your friends, now they're dinner.

The goal is to kill and eat as many other chickens as you can before the farmer kills you! 

Changelog

  • v0.1 - Basic prototype with core gameplay and no menus.
  • v0.2 - Added Main Menu

Controls

W,A,S,DMovement
ShiftSprintLeft ClickAttackSpaceJump
